setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.subtitle: Please configure model settings
setup.verifySuccessNoTool: Model verification successful, but does not support MCP Tool Calls
setup.topPDescription: Top P is a parameter that controls the diversity of text generated by the GPT model. When generating text, the model calculates probability distributions for each generated word or token in the vocabulary. Top P controls how many of the highest probability words or tokens are selected for text generation. For example, if top_p=0.9, the threshold is set to include tokens that cumulatively add up to 90% of the probability mass.
setup.temperatureDescription: Temperature is a parameter that controls the 'creativity' or randomness of text generated by the GPT model. A higher temperature (e.g., 0.7) leads to more diverse and innovative outputs, while a lower temperature (e.g., 0.2) makes the output more deterministic and focused.

event.frequencyHelp: Number of seconds for how often to send the prompt to the model
event.startDelayHelp: Number of seconds from the event creation timestamp to wait before the activating the event

tools.title: Tools Management(MCP)
tools.subtitle: Tools and settings for MCP Server
tools.addServerSubtitle: Please paste MCP Server Json directly

modelConfig.title: Model Settings
modelConfig.customInstructionsDescription: These instructions are added to the end of the system prompt sent with every request.
